meanings.definition: The analysis of urine as a diagnostic tool.
meanings.sent1: The doctor ordered urinalyses to check for any health issues.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician performed urinalyses on the patient's sample.
meanings.sent3: The detective used the urinalyses results to solve the mystery of the missing pet.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to interpret urinalyses was like deciphering a complex code.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors in the urinalyses report made it easy to understand.

meanings.sent1: The medical team discussed the different urinalyses they had conducted.
meanings.sent2: The urinalyses of the patients were all normal.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher accidentally said 'urinalyses' instead of 'urinalysis'.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were filled with bottles of various urinalyses samples.
meanings.sent5: The importance of submitting accurate urinalyses was emphasized during the training session.
